name: Look at Me Now Dress - Candy
description:
Final sale on all current items available on the online store! Items will be available for purchase until 19.01.2013 and will be posted by 30.01.2013.

Was $139

This piece is exactly as the name says. Designed to turn heads this dress is not for the girl who likes to shy away from attention. Don't miss out on this essential party piece from Lust for Gold's 'Gold Souk Collection'.

~The Gold Souk Collection~
 
Inspired by the culture-rich traditional market places of the Arab region, the gold souks, the “Gold Souk Collection” radiates and encompasses the lust for gold that the people have had in this region since the days of the Persian Empire. All the pieces featured in this collection are designed to encompass the rich culture and undeniable gold fever you are struck with when you first lay eyes on gold. The overpowering Lust for Gold you will feel with your first purchase from the Gold Souk Collection will keep you hooked.

name: All That Glitters Skirt
description:
Final sale on all current items available on the online store! Items will be available for purchase until 19.01.2013 and will be posted by 30.01.2013.

Was $169

Love sequins but don't want to be the girl who stands out looking like a disco ball? This matte finished sequin skirt has a subtle sheen, which will make you stand out for all the right reasons. This high quality silk based piece is a wardrobe must have for SS12/13 and a limited edition piece from the Lust for Gold 'Gold Souk Collection' collection.

Limited edition items will have between 5 and 10 items available in each colour and style.

name: Marika Dress - Amethyst
description:
Final sale on all current items available on the online store! Items will be available for purchase until 19.01.2013 and will be posted by 30.01.2013.

Was $169

This striking piece is the first design from the Lust for Gold collection. Originally designed as a one off piece, the outstanding attention it recieved meant it had to be added to the Gold Souk Collection. This piece is the most popular of the collection and only 3 to 4 dresses will be available in each colour.

Colour: Amethyst, also available in teal.

name: After Summers Rain Maxi - Candy
description:
Final sale on all current items available on the online store! Items will be available for purchase until 19.01.2013 and will be posted by 30.01.2013.

Was $189

This gorgeous full length maxi dress with fitted bodice and high neckline can be either an elegant evening dress or dressed down with a cute pair of flats. Made from a soft flowing silk/cotton blend skirt, this dress feels as good as it looks. Available in Ivory, Black or Candy, with gold skirt.

This is a Lust for Gold classic is limited edition in these colour combinations.

Limited edition items will have between 5 and 10 items available in each colour and style.
